name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
directions: brown butter and let it cool
mix all the dry ingredients except flour
mix in eggs one at a time
add vanilla and butter gradually
add flour gradually
add chocolate chips
rest in fridge for at least an hour or 2 days for best results
take out of fridge and rest for at least an hour to make it easier to scoop
place onto parthment paper and make a hole in the middle
bake at 325° for about 20 min or until edges are brown
for double chocolate chip cookies, take off 0.5 cups flour and add 1.5 cups cocoa powder
(Try using 0.25 cups less butter)

name: Lemon Cookies
directions: mix flour, baking owder, and salt
mix in the rest of the ingredients
chill in the fridge for 1 hr
roll cookies in powdered sugar and place on parchment paper
bake at 350° for about 15 min or until edges are brown
(try boiling the lemon juice a little and add an extra 2tbsp of juice)

name: Sugar Cookies
directions: mix butter, sugar and cream cheese
mix in eggs, vanilla, and almond extract
mix in the rest of the ingredients
chill for 2 hours
roll out dough and cut into shapes
bake at 350° for about 10-12 min or until edges are brown

name: Chocolate Brownies
recipe: 16 oz chocolate chips(half melted, half chopped)
directions: melt half the chocolate chips and let it cool
in another bowl, melt the butter
mix in sugar into the butter
add eggs one at a time, milk, and vanilla
add melted chocoalate
add flour, cocoa powder, salt, and expresso powder
add any toppings
put partchment paper in oiled pan and pour batter in
bake at 350° for about 22 min or until edges start cracking
(Try browning butter and taking out 4 tbsp of butter)

name: Cinnamon Rolls
directions: mix 2 cups milk and yeast and let it proof for at 5-10 min
mix sugar, 8 tbsp melted butter and the yeast mixture
mix in 4 cups of flour and knead
rest for an hour
add 1 cup of flour and salt and knead
rest for 35-45 min
Filling: mix brown sugar, 1.5 cups softened butter, and cinnamon
roll out dough and add filling
butter pan and bake at 350° for about 25-30 min or until light brown
Frosting: mix cream cheese, melted butter, vanilla, 8 tbsp milk, and powdered sugar
let it cool for 10-15 min and add frosting
(try adding some heavy cream before baking)

name: Pizza Dough
directions: mix water and yeast and let it proof for at least 5 min
mix flour, sugar, salt, and yeast mixture
knead
rest in oiled bowl for 1-2 hours or until doubled in size
punch dough and let it rest for 15-30 min
roll dough onto oiled pan
bake at 400°-500° until edges are light brown

name: Garlic Knots
directions: mix yeasrt and water and let it proof for 5-10 min
mix 2 cups flour, sugar, milk and yeast mixture
cover for 10 min
add garlic pwder, 3 cups flour, oil, and salt
knead and roll in shape
add eggwash with garlic
add onto partchment and bake at 350° for 10-20 min or until edges are light brown
(Try adding 3 tbsp of oil and bake at 340)

name: Bagels
time: boil for 1 min each side then 400° 20-25 min
directions: mix water and yeast and let it proof for 5-10 min
mix in sugar flour, salt and yeast mixture
for a sweeter bagel use 4 tbsp of sugar
knead and then rest for an hour or until doubled
add asny toppings and shape into bagels and let it rest for for 10-20 min
boil for 1 min each side
add egg wash with milk after taking them out
use partchment paper and bake at 400° for 20-25 min
(Try adding honey or baking soda in boiling water for chewier textuer)

name: Conchas
directions: mix evaporated milk, sugar, and yeast and let it proof for 5-10 min
mix flour, sugar, and cinammon
mix in butter, vanilla, and yeast mixture
add eggs gradually and salt
knead and then rest for 1-2 hours or until doubled
for the sugar on top:
mix powdered sugar, 1 cup flour, butter, and vanilla
for chocolate att 1-2 tbsp cocoa powder
roll dough into shape and place onto partchment paper
butter conchas then add sugar topping
rest for 30 min
bake at 325° for 18-20 min
try baking at 315

name: Apple Pie
directions: mix 10 tbsp butter, sugar, salt, and flour
mix until combined and rest in fridge for 1-2 hours
for the filling, peel and cut apples in half slices
mx 0.5 cu[s borwn sugar, cornstartch, 2 tsp cinammon, vinegar, 0.5 tsp salt, and 2 tbsp butter
for the crumble, mix 1 cup flour, oats, 0.33 cups brown sugar, 1 tsp cinnamon, 0.5 tsp salt, 10 tbsp butter
roll out crust onto pan, add the filling, and then the crumble
bake at 400° for about 18 min or untl light browning, then cover with foil and bake at 350° for another hour

name: Churros
directions: mix butter water, salt, sugar, and vanilla
add flour gradually
add eggs gradually
immedialty coat in sugar and do not store in airtight containers

name: Chocolate Cheesecake
time: 250° ~1 hr-1 hr 30 min w/ water bath
directions: For crust, blend 24-30 oreos and mix with 5 tbsp melted butter
press onto bottom of pan
bake at 250° for 10 min
let it cool
for the filling melt the chocolate and let it cool a little
mix in cream cheese, Greek Yogurt, sugar, cornstarch, eggs, and salt
pour onto crust and bake it at 250° for 1 hour in a water bath or until it has a jello texture

name: Banana Nut Muffins
directions: mix flour, baking soda, baking powder, salt, cinammon, allspice, and cardamom
smash bananas and add it to the dry ingredients
mix in melted butter, vanilla, yogurt, eggs, and sugar
add pecans or any toppings
bake at 375° for 5 min, then 350° for 15 min or until edges are light brown

name: Chocolate Cake
directions: Mix all dry ingredients in a separate bowl except sugar and put aside
In another bowl cream butter and sugar until fluffy
Add eggs one at a time and mix well after each addition
Add the vanilla and mix
Gradually add the dry ingredients, oil, and buttermilk and mix until combined
Grease two 9" round cake pans and lightly dust with flour
Add the batter and bake at 350° for about 20-30 min or until a toothpick comes out with some crumbs
Try letting the cake cool upside down on a wire rack after a few minutes

name: Lemon Cake
directions: whip egg whites until stiff peaks
fold in sugar, salt, and egg yolks
add oil, milk, lemon juice, and zest
gradually add flour, cornstarch, and baking powder
bake at 350° for 30 to 35 min or until edges are light brown
(try boiling lemon juice a little)

name: Red Velvet Cake
directions: sift flour, cocoa powder, baking soda, and salt
mix in the rest of the ingredients
bake at 350°

name: Carrot Cake
directions: mix everything together and bake at 335°

name: Chocolate Cream Cheese Frosting
directions: whipe cream cheese and butter until fluffy
sift powdered sugar and cocoa powder and mix it in
add milk and vanilla

name: Chocolate Heavy Cream Frosting
recipe: Stablizer: 3/4 block cream cheese, softened or 1 tbsp instant pudding mix
directions: if using cream cheese, whip it until fluffy
slowly add heavy cream and whip it until stiff peaks
sift powdered sugar, expresso powder, and cocoa powder and mix it in
if using instant pudding mix, mix it with the other dry ingredients
add vanilla and salt
Add milk if needed

name: Royal Icing
directions: whip eggs until frothy and slowly add powdered sugar
add salt and vanilla
add water if needed

name: Vanilla ButterCream for Macarons
directions: whip butter until almost stiff peaks
sift in powdered sugar
add vanilla and slowly add hevay cream until desired consistency

name: Macarons
directions: blend powdered sugar, salt, and almond flour
whip egg whites and salt until stiff peaks
slowly add gramulated sugar while whipping
add vanilla and any food coloring
fold in the dry ingredients until combined
batter should form a ribbon when lifted and disappear in 10-15 sec
put batter into piping bag and pipe onto parchment paper
tap the tray to remove air bubbles
rest for 30 min to 60 min or until a skin develops
bake at 300° for about 17 min or until they develop feet
let them cool completely before taking them off

name: Glaze
directions: bloom gelatin in 0.5 cups cold water
boil 0.25 cups of water with corn syrup and sugar
after it thickens lower heat and add condensed milk and white chocolate
add the gelatin and any food coloring and mix until combined
let it cool a little and quickly add it to the cake before it hardens
